text: Real Valladolid Club de Fútbol is a Spanish football team (also known as Pucela). It was founded on 20 June 1928 and holds its matches at Nuevo José Zorrilla stadium, Valladolid, Castile and León. Valladolid plays in the LFP (Spanish Football League). The team has a reserve team in the Third División (4th tier of the Spanish league). Its the just team from its region in play Europeans competitions: UEFA Cup (1984-85, 1997-98) and UEFA Cup Winners' Cup (1989-90). At 1983-84 they made its most successful season after won the former League Cup to Atlético de Madrid 0-3. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 La Liga 16th 2001/02 La Liga 12th 2002/03 La Liga 13th 2003/04 La Liga 18th 2004/05 Segunda División 6th 2005/06 Segunda División 11th 2006/07 Segunda División Champions 2007/08 La Liga 15th 2008/09 La Liga 16th === Former position === == References == == Other websites == *Official website *Futbolme team profile Category:1928 establishments in Spain Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Valladolid
title: Real Valladolid C.F.
